body: Tried my hand at making homemade #icecream! It didn’t turn out as smooth as I hoped, but it still tastes amazing. Thoughts? #homemade #dessert

comments.body: That looks delicious! What flavor did you go for?
@23232 Thanks! I made vanilla with some chocolate chunks. Next time, I’m thinking of trying something a bit fancier.
I’ve always wanted to make ice cream! Did you use an ice cream maker or go old school?
@34343 I used an ice cream maker. It was my first time trying it, so there’s definitely room for improvement!
Looks pretty good to me! How long did it take to freeze?
@45454 It took about 4 hours to fully freeze, but the waiting was the hardest part!
Was it easy to get the texture right? I’ve heard homemade ice cream can turn out grainy sometimes.
@56565 Yeah, it was a bit tricky. I think I need to churn it longer next time to get that really smooth texture.
Looks awesome! Any plans to try more adventurous flavors? Maybe some fruit or caramel swirl?
@67676 Definitely! I’ve got my eye on making a strawberry-basil flavor next. Going to experiment with some fun combos!
